DOC.brief_title: Parturient Controlled Epidural Analgesia ( PCEA ) With Without Basal Infusion Early Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Patient Controlled Epidural Analgesia widely use effective mean adult pain management . However , Parturient Controlled Epidural Analgesia ( PCEA ) relatively new approach pain control woman labor . With recent acquisition new PCEA technology Baystate Medical Center possible make patient control technology available Labor Delivery unit . Several study conduct evaluate effect Parturient Controlled Epidural Analgesia different outcome range dose local anesthetic use , incidence motor block , quality analgesia , obstetric safety outcome , number patient receive anesthetic intervention . We previously show epidural fentanyl ( give 10 ml volume ) useful mean achieve analgesia labor patient receive epidural analgesia . Furthermore , show add bupivacaine fentanyl infusion increase analgesic period . This increase analgesic duration achieve without clinically detectable motor block . This study design determine whether difference analgesia , side effect , analgesic duration patient receive bupivacaine fentanyl PCEA management labor pain . The present study hypothesize analgesic protocol include basal infusion rate addition bolus dose control patient longer analgesic duration pump protocol basal infusion add bolus dose control patient . Methods : The study population consist 100 adult obstetrical patient great 36 week gestation request labor analgesia . Patients great 5 cm cervical dilation , patient receive intravenous opioid agonist , patient contraindication fentanyl exclude . Patients pre-eclampsia also exclude . The screening process occur patient request labor analgesia . The study explain patient well option receive labor analgesia without participate study protocol . The epidural catheter place usual fashion L2-3 interspace . The catheter inject 3ml lidocaine 1.5 % epinephrine 1:200,000 `` test dose '' ( usual practice Baystate follow insertion epidural catheter ) rule placement intravenous catheter . All catheter place 5 cm . Following customary test dosing , patient give Fentanyl 100 mcg 10 ml volume . After woman comfortable epidural , approach patient . If patient agrees participate study sign consent form , study procedure initiate . One follow PCEA treatment protocol start randomize , double blind fashion . A random number table 60 patient generate Excel use Randbetween function . This function randomly generate 60 number either 1 2 . When series generate contains 30 1 's 30 2 's , series select random code study . A patient assign group 1 2 base next available number . This patient name enter next number rand code table . PCEA solution : Bupivacaine 0.0625 % fentanyl 2 mcg/ml Group 1 : Basal Infusion : 0 ml/hr ; Bolus 10 ml q 30min prn ( 10ml demand dose 30min lockout ) Group 2 : Basal Infusion : 10 ml/h ; Bolus 5 ml q 30min prn ( 5ml demand dose 30min lockout ) The pump program one investigator evaluations do another investigator unaware PCEA protocol . If patient obtain relief within 30 minute , epidural catheter dose local anesthetic study conclude . The patient without pain relief within 30 minute consider failed epidural drop study analysis . Following achievement satisfactory analgesia , patient evaluate every 30 minute request additional analgesic . The study `` end '' point , patient treat discretion anesthesiologist . Method delivery , need instrument delivery , time delivery , neonatal APGAR score record . The level discomfort , presence side effect ( motor block , sedation , pruritis , hypotension ) evaluate baseline , 10 , 20 , 30 minute every 30 minute thereafter . Pain evaluate use 100-mm visual analogue scale ( VAS ) 0 represent pain 100 represent worst possible pain . We track several PCEA parameter include volume infuse till study termination , Bolus Demands , Bolus Deliveries , time first bolus etc . All aspects patient ' care conform usual standard .
DOC.criteria: The study population consist 100 adult obstetrical patient great 36 week gestation request labor analgesia . Patients great 5 cm cervical dilation , Patients receive intravenous opioid agonist , Patients contraindication fentanyl , OR Patients preeclampsia also exclude .
